\begin{tabular}{\VAR{TABLE_HEADER_SPEC}}
    \BLOCK{-for row in data-}
        \BLOCK{-if row | is_raw_latex -}
                \VAR{row.latex_string}
        \BLOCK{-else-}
            \BLOCK{-for col in header-}
                \VAR{row[col]}
                \BLOCK{-if not loop.last-}
                    &
                \BLOCK{-endif-}
            \BLOCK{-endfor-}\\
        \BLOCK{-endif-}
    \BLOCK{-endfor-}
\end{tabular}
